commits.author: Alexander Greim
commits.body:
I added support for Homebrew installations of MacVim. Installing it that way is a common for developers.
https://github.com/Homebrew/homebrew/blob/master/share/doc/homebrew/Installation.md

commits.author: Alan
commits.summary: Set filetype to markdown when opening in MacVim.

commits.author: Benny Kjær Nielsen
commits.summary: Changed shortcut to match other editor bundles.
